page.title: 02An average Wednesday for me
page.content: My dad came in this morning to wake me up at 7:30.I dragged myself out of bed a couple of minutes later.I got my school uniform on and went downstairs to have my breakfast.My breakfast consists of Kellogs Crunchy Nut cornflakes and toast.After breakfast I went back upstairs to wash,clean my teeth,and brush my hair.I then went to put my lunch_box and flask in my bag. My friends mum took me to school in her car.When I got to school I chatted with my friends until the whistle went. In class we did some maths and then we went swimming in the school pool.As usual it was{freezing}cold! When we got back to class we did English for half an hour,and then we went out to play.At half past twelve the sandwich eating children went into
